# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Special Instructions

None.

```julia
function wrap_string(text::AbstractString; text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = []
    for line in split(text, " ")
        if length(line) > text_width
            new_line = line[1:text_width]
            push!(lines, new_line * "\n")
            while length(line) - text_width > 0
                new_line = line[(text_width + 1):end]
                push!(lines, new_line * " ")
            end
        else
            push!(lines, line * " ")
        end
    end
    return join(lines, "")
end

# Example usage:
text = "This is a very long sentence that should be wrapped at 10 characters per line."
wrapped_text = wrap_string(text, text_width=10)
println(wrapped_text)
```
